en-US.errorNoSongs: There are currently no songs available to load. Why not create one?
en-US.errorSongImport: Could not import song, file was possibly not a valid {extension} file, or made by an incompatible version of Efflux
en-US.confirmSongDelete: Are you sure you want to delete song '{song}' ? This operation cannot be undone.
en-US.songExported: Song "{song}" exported to your download folder
en-US.localSongsExpl: The songs listed here are stored in your browser. You can also import/export songs from/to your local device storage or connect to Dropbox to save your projects directly to your cloud storage.
